Package index

All functions

dataDump()
Dump all of curatedMetagenomicData as two .csv files
filter_sort()
Filter and Sort Features in Meta-analysis final data-frame
makeSEforCondition()
Make a dataset for a condition of interest.
runMetaanalysis_categorical()
Single Species Meta-analysis (Categorical Variables)
runMetaanalysis_quantitative()
Single Species Meta-analysis (Quantitative Variables)
